#### Online methods workshops:

- Upcoming: [KOMEX 2026 Methods Excellence Workshops (MethodsNET)](https://afww.uni-konstanz.de/en/komex/konstanz-methods-excellence-workshops), University of Konstanz (February 2026): "Introduction to AI-driven Text Analysis".
- Upcoming: [KOMEX 2026 Methods Excellence Workshops (MethodsNET)](https://afww.uni-konstanz.de/en/komex/konstanz-methods-excellence-workshops), University of Konstanz (February 2026): "Fine-Tuning Large Language Models".
- **AI-Powered Qualitative Analysis in R**, full-day online workshop with [Ken Benoit](https://kenbenoit.net/) on using Large Language Models (LLMs) for qualitative data analysis in R, offered in the Instats platform, [available on demand here](https://instats.org/seminar/ai-powered-qualitative-analysis-in-r).
- **Tuning LLMs for Text Analysis**, half-day online workshop on fine-tuning open-source LLMs in Python, offered in the Instats platform, [available on demand here](https://instats.org/seminar/fine-tuning-llms-for-text-analysis).
- **Using AI for Text Analysis (Introduction)**, full-day online workshop on working with Large Language Models (LLMs) in R for text analysis, offered on the Instats platform, [available on demand here](https://instats.org/seminar/using-ai-for-text-analysis-an-introduct2).
- **Using AI for Text Analysis (Advanced Applications)**, full-day online workshops on fine-tuning Large Language Models (LLMs) in Python for text analysis, offered on the Instats platform, [available on demand here](https://instats.org/seminar/using-ai-for-text-analysis-an-introduct2).
- **Quarto in RStudio: Writing Reproducible and Dynamic Research Papers**, full-day online workshop offered on the Instats platform, [available on demand here](https://instats.org/seminar/quarto-in-r-studio-writing-reproducible2).
